Thanks to the live preview of the backend, creating and re- arranging images is at ease. Even hover style is also previewed.
Clean design, yet simple to customize with plenty options available.
Table is essential when presenting specification of your product. You may choose between two pre-defined style: Minimal and Fill.
Make a shout out to your audience with these boxes
Fully customize size, color and hover style as you wish.
Present your numbers beautifully with these 3 pre-defined styles.
Make your team members look even more professional with our clean and elegant design.
Come with packed of options available including a carousel setup. You may also turn it as a quote box.
Increase your goal conversion rate with the call-to-action box. You may adjust button size and background for better result.
Easily create arrays of your client logo and make a link to each one.
Easily emphasize your number with animation.
You may add any element in a tab with drag and drop just as usual. And, they come with 3 styles and 3 positions.
Keep your info well-organized with clean and simple design.
Interactive acts as a box with two states: normal and on hover, in which you can change background or add elements to each one.
To create more interactive call to action, background image and effect can be manage, also the transition styles of the content.
Give your site a little fancy with the animated heading text. There are Flip and Type style to choose from, and a lot of options.
Whether it is in a week or a day basis, Countdown is an essential bit for launching a new site. Always make it count and cool.
Creating and editing Slider is at ease. Preview are right on the Page Builder.
Box can be pinned to any element, so it becomes sticky to the reference element.
Whether it is for a notification or an excessive pile of words and images, modal plays the best role for such a purpose.
Wrap any element inside "show more" element to control your content in the proper height.
Box acts as a wrapper to any element and/or content. You may manipulate its position, set height, and limit the max width.
Contact information widget for multi-branches, also Contact Form 7 which comes with two ready-to-use styles.
